Model.Project

Class ProjectService

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.Project.ProjectService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Originator<ProjectService.ProjectServiceMemento,ProjectService>

    public class ProjectService
extends java.lang.Object
implements Originator<ProjectService.ProjectServiceMemento,ProjectService>
    This class is used as a service to operate on projects and subsystems.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ProjectService.ProjectServiceMemento
      This class provides utility for saving the state of the system at a certain point in time during execution of the Bug Trap software.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      ProjectService()
      Default constructor for a project service.

      • assignRole

        public void assignRole(Project project,
                       Role role,
                       User user)
                throws ReportErrorToUserException
        Method to assign a role to a user for a specified project.
        Parameters:
        project - the project to which the role assignment is being made
        role - the role that is being set to the specified user
        user - the user to which the new role is being assigned
        Throws:
        ReportErrorToUserException - is thrown if the user cannot be assigned to the role in the project.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - The project, role or user is null.

      • setNewProjectMilestone

        public void setNewProjectMilestone(Project project,
                                   Milestone newProjectMilestone)
                            throws ReportErrorToUserException
        Method to set a new project milestone. There occurs consistency checking: first pass: project milestone should not exceed any subsystem milestone second pass: project milestone should not exceed the target milestone of any related bug report with a non-final tag.
        Parameters:
        project - The project to assign the new milestone to.
        newProjectMilestone - the new project milestone that has to be set
        Throws:
        ReportErrorToUserException - is thrown in case that a constraint is broken.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Project is null

      • setNewSubSystemMilestone

        public void setNewSubSystemMilestone(SubSystem subSystem,
                                     java.util.List<Milestone> milestoneList)
                              throws ReportErrorToUserException
        Method to set milestones to a subsystem
        Parameters:
        subSystem - The subsystem to set its milestone
        milestoneList - The list of milestones
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - subsystem or milestoneList is null
        ReportErrorToUserException - is thrown in case that a constraint is broken

      • setNewSubSystemMilestone

        public void setNewSubSystemMilestone(SubSystem subSystem,
                                     Milestone newSubsystemMilestone)
                              throws ReportErrorToUserException
        Method to set a new subsystem milestone. There occurs consistency checking: first pass: subsystem milestone should not exceed any recursive subsystem's milestone second pass: subsystem milestone should not exceed the target milestone of any related bug report with a non-final tag.
        Parameters:
        subSystem - The subsystem to set the new milestone of.
        newSubsystemMilestone - the new subsystem milestone that has to be set
        Throws:
        ReportErrorToUserException - is thrown in case that a constraint is broken. throws IllegalArgumentException The subsystem is null.

      • split

        public void split(SubSystem sToSplit,
                  Project project,
                  java.lang.String name1,
                  java.lang.String description1,
                  java.lang.String name2,
                  java.lang.String description2,
                  java.util.List<SubSystem> s1,
                  java.util.List<BugReport> b1,
                  java.util.List<SubSystem> s2,
                  java.util.List<BugReport> b2)
           throws ReportErrorToUserException
        Method to split a subsystem
        Parameters:
        sToSplit - The subsystem to split
        project - The project of the subsystem
        name1 - The name of the first splitted subsystem
        description1 - The description of the first splitted subsystem
        name2 - The name of the second splitted subsystem
        description2 - The description of the second splitted subsystem
        s1 - The list of subsystem for the first splitted subsystem
        b1 - The list of bug report for the first splitted subsystem
        s2 - The list of subsystem for the second splitted subsystem
        b2 - The list of bug report for the second splitted subsystem
        Throws:
        ReportErrorToUserException
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when one of the parameters is null, the subsystem is not from the project, the list of subsystems/bug reports or not from the subsystem
